content: My name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt, the landlord of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide you with an exact number. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, offered the apartment for 1,200 Euro per month, but I, Farhad Abbasi, was looking for a price closer to 900 Euro per month, which he was not willing to negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As we did not reach an agreement on the rental price, I would rate my satisfaction with the outcome as a 5 out of 10.
name: Peter Schmidt
